body_html:
Power users can already disable asserts in kernels by building PyTorch with the correct flag, so we already have the specialized build we're talking about available to them.

I'll close this for now until a better alternative to asserts is developed.

I'll close this for now until a better alternative to asserts is developed.
body:
Power users can already disable asserts in kernels by building PyTorch with the correct flag, so we already have the specialized build we're talking about available to them.

I'll close this for now until a better alternative to asserts is developed.
